entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Rain showers or flurries at times heavy changing to flurries at times heavy and ending early this evening then clearing. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 90 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
